content: i love a reversible scarf - no need to worry about which side is showing this scarf pattern is really adaptable to knit with any yarn and to any size - your imagination is the only limit the photographs show the scarf knit in an adult size in rowan cocoon - the white scarf a 4ply weight cashmere - the blue / green scarf cascade 220 - the purple scarf laceweight silk and baby camel - the grey scarf
